fr.enst.markingmenus.objects

Class MarkingMenuItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.enst.markingmenus.objects.MarkingMenuItem

  • public class MarkingMenuItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a menu item. It can contain items and has id and text.
    Author:
    Goui

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<MarkingMenuItem> children
      The list of items the item contains.

      private int id
      The menu index.
      private OnMenuItemMarkListener markListener
      The click event listener.
      private java.lang.String text
      The text displayed in the item.
